display.caption: Outsiders Extra Credit: Snakes and Ladders

questions.01: What is one of Ponyboy's sibling's names?
questions.03: What is the first name of ONE of the girls at the movies?
questions.04: What is the name of one of the people who wait in line for popcorn at the movies?
questions.05: What is the name of Sodapop's old horse?
questions.06: What is the name of one of the boys who pull in to pick up Cherry and Marcia?
questions.07: What weapon does Johnny use to kill Bob?
questions.08: Where did Bob drown Ponyboy in?
questions.09: What book does Johnny bring back when Ponyboy and him are at the church?
questions.10: Where did Ponyboy eat before the church started to burn?
questions.11: When going through the burning church, what article of clothing saved Ponyboy's life?
questions.12: Who is stuck inside the burning chruch?
